author: jbellis
msg: add test catching buggy update of header on flush; refactor so there is only one version of code doing those writes (the correct one).

author: jbellis
msg: don't remove commitlog files when replay fails; you lose the chance to fix a bug, as well as your data.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-264

author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-483: Use exception chaining to provide more information when Axiom fails to get the InputStream from a DataHandler.
